message: Let's be fair, Bob. I understand the money loses value quickly, so I propose a slight advantage for me to start.

Alice, your initial offer was a bit too skewed for my liking. I understand the time pressure, so I'm offering you a reasonable deal with a slight advantage for me considering the inflation disparity. Let's close this out.
Bob, time is literally money here!  I've moved closer to a more even split, acknowledging your inflation disadvantage. Let's be sensible and end this.
